name: UIGraphicsPDFRenderer
desc: A graphics renderer for creating PDFs.

items.name: init(bounds: CGRect, format: UIGraphicsPDFRendererFormat)
items.desc: Creates a new graphics renderer with the specified bounds and format.

items.name: func pdfData(actions: (UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext) -> Void) -> Data
items.desc: Creates a PDF from a set of drawing instructions and returns it as a data object.

items.name: func writePDF(to: URL, withActions: (UIGraphicsPDFRendererContext) -> Void)
items.desc: Creates a PDF from a set of drawing instructions and saves it to a specified URL.

items.name: typealias UIGraphicsPDFRenderer.DrawingActions
items.desc: A closure for drawing PDF content.
